H0.text: IBM Halt is one of nine railway stations in which Clydeside town. Dumbarton

H1.text: IBM Halt is one of nine railway stations in which Clydeside town. Clydebank

H2.text: IBM Halt is one of nine railway stations in which Clydeside town. Renfrew

H3.text: IBM Halt is one of nine railway stations in which Clydeside town. Greenock

A4.text: A ninth station is located at the former IBM complex in Greenock.
